name: PartyMan - A Pacman Clone
description:
A pacman clone for the Vircon32 console. 

Credits: 

font : Minecraft, by Craftron Gaming

music : Pacman-clone Background Music, by remaxim

sfx : Pacman-clone Wakka Sound by remaxim

This is a Plan B. I failed several times my original idea, so I took a few steps back and thought in the simplest game I could successfully implement so I could submit something to the jam. Now, post-jam, I have time to understand and fix what is wrong with my original Idea.
